title: Right wing sedition in U.S. adds another chapter with 1/6 trial
description: ...Plus, Rachel Maddow announces her new podcast, Rachel Maddow Presents: Ultra, will launch with the first two episodes on Monday, October 10th. Follow now wherever you get podcasts!
author: multimedia@msnbc.com (MSNBC)
